trans-unit.source: Associates an action taken on an activity designer on the workflow design surface with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Associa uma ação efetuada num designer de atividade na superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho com o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] A designer action is a user action that is performed when you activate a designer glyph on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Um estruturador é uma ação do utilizador que é executada quando ativar um estruturador glifos na superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The DesignerAction class is used to indicate your actions.
trans-unit.target: A classe de DesignerAction é utilizada para indicar as suas ações.

trans-unit.source: The DesignerAction class is also used to add the task items by the adornment service.
trans-unit.target: A classe de DesignerAction também é utilizada para adicionar os itens de tarefa pelo serviço adornos.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref> class by using an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>, an integer, and a string.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"> </xref> classe utilizando um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref>, um número inteiro e uma cadeia.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> on which the designer action is taken.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> no qual a ação designer é executada.

trans-unit.source: An integer value that represents the identifier of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um valor inteiro que representa o identificador do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the text associated with the designer action.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que representa o texto associado com a ação estruturador.

trans-unit.source: activityDesigner contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: activityDesignercontém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: text contains a null reference () or its length is 0.
trans-unit.target: textcontém uma referência nula () ou o comprimento é 0.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref> class by using <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>, an integer, a string, and an <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"> </xref> classe utilizando <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref>, um número inteiro, uma cadeia e o <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> on which the designer action is to appear.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> no qual a ação designer é a aparecer.

trans-unit.source: An integer value that represents the identifier of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um valor inteiro que representa o identificador do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the text associated with the designer action.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que representa o texto associado com a ação estruturador.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to be associated with the designer action.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> estar associado a ação estruturador.

trans-unit.source: activityDesigner contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: activityDesignercontém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: text contains a null reference () or its length is 0.
trans-unit.target: textcontém uma referência nula () ou o comprimento é 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets the identifier for the designer action.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o identificador para a acção do estruturador.

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the identifier for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Um número inteiro que representa o identificador para o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the image associated with the designer action.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a imagem associada com a ação estruturador.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> que se encontra associado a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Invokes the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnExecuteDesignerAction*> method of the activity designer associated with the current designer action.
trans-unit.target: Invoca o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnExecuteDesignerAction*>método do designer de atividade associado com a ação de estruturador atual.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnExecuteDesignerAction*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnExecuteDesignerAction%2A> method is called when you click a validation error displayed by the activity designer on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnExecuteDesignerAction%2A>método é chamado quando clicar num erro de validação apresentado pelo designer de atividade na superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnExecuteDesignerAction%2A>

trans-unit.source: Represents the name of the property that the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Representa o nome da propriedade que o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"> </xref> está associado.

trans-unit.source: In the property editor, the property that corresponds to the PropertyName of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction> provides a visual cue that signals the presence of an associated <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction>.
trans-unit.target: No editor de propriedade, a propriedade que corresponde ao PropertyName de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction>fornece um visual rectângulos que indica a presença de um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction> associados</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the name of the property.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que contém o nome da propriedade.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the text associated with the designer action.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o texto associado com a ação estruturador.

trans-unit.source: A string value that represents the text associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de cadeia que representa o texto associado a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a dictionary of user data associated with the designer action.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um dicionário de dados de utilizador associados com a ação estruturador.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that represents the user data associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>que representa os dados de utilizador associados a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>
